message.original: 攻守のバランスに長けた戦場の花形 盾を駆使したカウンター戦法を得意とする 常に前線に斬り込んでいける安定感が持ち味
message.translation: Balances offense and defense in battle. Can use the shield to counter attacks. The Leader of the Battlefield.

message.original: ヒット＆アウェイのかく乱戦を得意とする軽業師 ロープワークで死角に回り込み、瞬時に巨大敵の 頭上に迫り連撃を加える様は戦場の疾風
message.translation: An acrobat who excels at hit and run tactics. Uses a rope to instantly move to the blind spot of large enemies. The Gale of the Battlefield.

message.original: 精密な射撃で遠距離から先制するスナイパー役 特殊矢による多様な支援力も魅力 強敵の弱点を正確に射ぬき戦況を優位に導く
message.translation: Able to deal precise damage from long distances. Has a variey of support abilities by the use of special arrows. The Sniper of the Battlefield.

message.original: 回復と支援魔法で仲間を支える癒しの術師 その術は味方へのさまざまな恩恵だけでなく 怒れる敵の“隠された弱点”すら看破する
message.translation: Supports the party with healing and support magick. Can not only heal, but also reveal weakness of enemies. The Pillar of the Battlefield.

message.original: 敵の注目を一手に集め反撃する強固な砦役 大盾で受けた敵の力を攻撃・支援の術に変換 ５属性を操り、仲間を属性面でもフォローする
message.translation: Attracts attention and protect others with their strong defense. Convert the power of their enemies into magick of the five elements to attack and support. The Fortress of the Battlefield.

message.original: 絶大な威力の攻撃魔法を操る魔術師 術は紡がれた魔法陣によりさらに威力を高める 長い詠唱を効率よく放つには仲間の支援が必要
message.translation: Magician who commands great magick to cause great harm. Can enhance magick by chanting, but needs to be protected. The Calamity of the Battlefield.

message.original: 受けた痛みを反撃の力に変える剛力の重戦車 敵の攻撃を耐え忍ぶほどにその一撃は重みを増す 大剣の一振りは巨大な標的をも怯ませ葬る
message.translation: Endures pain to deliver even greater damage to their enemies. One swing of their huge sword can even bury enemies. The Behemoth of the Battlefield.

message.original: 魔道弓により霊力の魔矢を操る神秘の射手 自動的に標的を追ういく本もの魔矢は敵の急所を 穿つ刃のみならず、味方を癒す光にもなる
message.translation: Mysterious archer who manipulates magick into their magick bow. They can attack enemies, support allies and show the weak points of enemies. The Eyes of the Battlefield.

message.original: 錬金の秘術により敵の注意を引きうける策士 論理と錬成物質を用いて状態異常を操り、摂理を 超えた高い移動能力を駆使して敵戦力を散らす
message.translation: Soldier who attracts the enemys' attention using alchemy and high mobility. Uses the secrets of alchemy to inflict and manipulate status abnormalities. The Trickster of the Battlefield.

message.original: 精霊槍を振るい森羅の加護を得た槍士 霊の加護は一時的に戦闘能力を引き上げるだけ でなく、自身や仲間を癒し導く守護にもなる
message.translation: A Warrior blessed and protect by the spirits. With their spirit spear they can heal, lead and support the party. The Druid of the Battlefield.
